japanese: （ふう、いいお湯でした……）
translation: (Ah, that was a nice bath...)

japanese: あ、五月ちゃんおかえり～。
translation: Oh, welcome back, Itsuki-chan.

japanese: お風呂、お先に頂きました。
translation: I took the first bath.

japanese:
ほらほら！
五月もこっちに来て！
translation:
Hey hey!
Come over here! You too, Itsuki!

japanese:
え？　何をしてるんですか？
みんな揃って……。
translation:
Huh? What are you doing?
Everyone's all here...

japanese:
明日からの予定を立ててたんだ。
上杉さんがお風呂に入ってるうちにね。
translation:
We were planning tomorrow's schedule.
While Uesugi-san is taking his bath.

japanese:
今度は、私たちがフータローに
楽しんでもらう番だから。
サプライズ。
translation:
Now it's our turn to make Futaro
enjoy himself.
Give him a surprise.

japanese:
この島に来てから大変だったけど、
残りの日くらいは、思いっきり
楽しいことをしなくちゃね。
translation:
It's been tough since we came to this island,
but we need to have as much fun as possible
for the remaining days.

japanese: そして、あわよくば……ふふっ！
translation: And, if possible... Heheh!

japanese: むむ……。
translation: Mmmhh...

japanese:
（二乃、三玖も……
　きっと、上杉君との想い出を作ろうと
　考えているのですね）
translation:
(Nino and Miku... They're probably thinking
 about making memories with Uesugi-kun too.)

japanese:
五月、早く早く～。
ここはやっぱり、みんなで考えなくっちゃ。
translation:
Itsuki, hurry, hurry.
We need to think about this all together.

japanese: え、ええ……。
translation: O-okay...

japanese:
さーて、５人揃ったところでどうしよっか。
やっぱり定番の海かな？
translation:
Sooo, now that we're all together, what should we do?
Should we go to the beach as usual?

japanese:
あ、でも山登りなんてのもいいかも。
孤島の山からの風景なんて、
そうそう見られるものじゃないもんね。
translation:
Oh, but hiking the mountain might be good too.
The view from the top of the mountain on this
deserted island is something you don't see every day.

japanese:
あのフータロー君が相手でも、
唸らせることができそうじゃない？
translation:
Although, it is our Futaro-kun we're talking about here. 
He'd probably just complain, right?

japanese: ……一花、なんだか浮かれていませんか？
translation: ...Ichika, aren't you overreaching just a little bit?

japanese:
え？　そう？
まあ、仕方ないじゃない。
こういうときくらい楽しく過ごしたいって思うもん。
translation:
Huh? You think?
Well, I guess it can't be helped.
At times like this, I just want to have fun.

japanese:
五月ちゃんだってそうじゃない？
この夏は今しかないんだよ？
translation:
You feel the same way, right, Itsuki-chan?
We only have this summer, you know?

japanese: ええ、そうですね……。
translation: Yes, that's right...

japanese:
五月、どうしたの？
何か心配事でもある？
translation:
Itsuki, what's wrong?
Is there something you're worried about?

japanese:
そ、そんなことはありませんよ？
無事に島から脱出できそうですし、
心配事なんてありません！
translation:
N-no, not at all!
We'll probably be able to escape the island safely,
so there's nothing to worry about!

japanese:
そうよねー。
食事の問題にも、
もう頭を悩ませなくてもすむものね。
translation:
That's right.
We don't have to worry about
what to do for meals anymore either.

japanese: あはは……そうですね……。
translation: Ahaha... That's right...

japanese:
（……心配事がないなんて嘘です。
　むしろ心配事で頭がいっぱいですよっ！）
translation:
(...It's a lie. I'm very worried.
 In fact, my head is full of worries!)

japanese:
（このままでは、またあのときの……
　修学旅行のようなことになってしまうのでは……）
translation:
(If we continue like this,
 we might end up like we 
 did during our school trip...)

japanese:
（私たち以外には誰もいない無人島。
　こんな状況で、勉強から解き放たれて
　何も起こらないなんて――）
translation:
(There's no one else on this uninhabited island.
 In this situation, to be free from our studies
 and for nothing to happen%p-2;――%p;)

japanese: （そんな楽観的な考えになれるわけがありません！）
translation: (There's no way I can think so optimistically!)

japanese: おーい、五月ちゃん？
translation: Heeey, Itsuki-chan?

japanese: は、はいっ！？
translation: Y-yes?!

japanese: さっきから表情がコロコロ変わってるよ？
translation: Your expression has changed a lot.

japanese:
ええ、まあ、明日から
何をしようかと、つい考えてしまいまして。
た、楽しみですね～。
translation:
Um, well, I've just been thinking about
what we should do from tomorrow.
I'm reeaally looking forward to it.

japanese: ……ふーん。
translation: ....Hmmm.

japanese: 五月、積極的ねぇ。
translation: Itsuki, you're so eager.

japanese: そうですかぁ？
translation: You think so?

japanese:
（ううう……。
　三玖と二乃の視線が刺さるようです……）
translation:
(Ooohh...
 Miku and Nino's gazes are piercing...)

japanese:
（そもそも、この旅行自体、
　あまり賛成ではなかったんです。
　上杉君と私たちだけで別荘だなんて！）
translation:
(Actually, I wasn't really in favor of this trip.
 For it to be just Uesugi-kun and all of us at our villa?!)

japanese:
（上杉君に恩返しをするにしても、
　他にやり方はあったはずですし……）
translation:
(There must have been other ways
 to repay Uesugi-kun...)

japanese: また五月が百面相してる。
translation: Itsuki is making a face again.

japanese: 何を考えてるのかしらねぇ。
translation: I wonder what she's thinking about.

japanese:
（とにかく！
　これ以上、変なことが起こらないように
　私がいっそう注意しなければ！）
translation:
(Anyway!
 I have to be more careful to make sure
 nothing strange happens!)

japanese:
（姉妹の平穏は私が守ります！
　そうと決まれば……！）
translation:
(I shall protect the peace of my sisters!
 If I so choose...!)

japanese:
おお？　五月ちゃん？
急に立ち上がって、何か思いついたの？
translation:
Oh? Itsuki-chan?
Standing up so suddenly, 
did you come up with something?

japanese:
はい！
これ以上ない名案を思いつきました！
translation: Yes! I've come up with an incredible idea!

japanese: いいわ、聞かせてもらおうじゃない。
translation: Great, tell us about it.

japanese:
こほん。
では……。
translation:
Ahem.
Now then...

japanese: まずは、私たちの立場をよく考えてください。
translation: First, please consider our situation carefully.

japanese: 立場？
translation: Our situation?

japanese: そう、私たちは受験生なんですっ！
translation: Yes, we're all students studying for the entry exam!

japanese:
え、あ、うん、そうだけど、
今はあまり関係なくない？
translation:
Uh, yeah, that's true,
but I don't think it matters too much right now.

japanese:
大いに関係あります！
我々受験生にとって夏こそが勝負の時！
つまり、遊んでいる時間などありません！
translation:
It matters a lot! Summer is the time when we have
to show what we're made of as examinees!
That means we don't have time to waste playing around!

japanese: ええええ……。
translation: Whaaa...

japanese:
勉強をしましょう！
上杉君だって、きっと喜んで指導してくれます！
この夏は今しかないのです！！
translation:
So let's study!
I'm sure Uesugi-kun would be happy to help us out!
We can't afford to waste this summer!!

japanese: ねえ、あんたバカなの？
translation: Hey, are you stupid?

japanese: はいっ！？
translation: WHAT?!

japanese: チェンジ。
translation: Pass.

japanese: なっ！？
translation: Wha?!

japanese:
ごめん、五月ちゃん。
私も賛成できないかなー。
translation:
Sorry, Itsuki-chan.
I don't think I can agree with that idea either.

japanese:
あはは……。
私もさすがにここはちょっと。
translation:
Ahaha...
That's a little too much for even me, too.

japanese: そんな……。
translation: You guys...

japanese:
大体、フー君との想い出作りが目的なのに、
勉強じゃいつもと変わらないじゃない。
translation:
Besides, we're supposed to be making memories
with Fu-kun, right? Studying isn't going to be
any different from what we do normally.

japanese:
五月ちゃんの気持ちもわかるけど、
勉強は戻ってから頑張るってことにしたいかな。
translation:
I understand how you feel,
but I think I want to focus on studying
AFTER we get back.

japanese:
五月も、想い出作りのために
テスト頑張ったんじゃないの？
translation:
Didn't you study hard
for the sake of making memories with us, Itsuki?

japanese: それは……そうですが……。
translation: That's... Well...

japanese:
せっかく上杉さんが提案してくれたんだし、
今日と明日くらい勉強を忘れても
罰は当たらないって！
translation:
Since Uesugi-san suggested it, why don't we take a break
from studying for a day or two?
We won't get in trouble for it!

japanese: うう……。
translation: Ooohh...

japanese:
はい、じゃあ改めて！
明日からやることを考えよっか。
translation:
Okay, from the top!
Let's think about what we can do starting tomorrow.

japanese: 勉強以外でね。
translation: Other than studying, right?

japanese: はい……。
translation: Okay...

japanese:
（結局、押し負けてしまいました。
　私はなんて無力なのでしょう……）
translation: (In the end, I gave in. I'm so powerless...)

japanese:
（ああ、お母さん！
　私は一体どうすればいいのですか！？）
translation: (Oh, Mother! Whatever should I do?!)
